### {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}
#### Partial data
```{r}
# change titles to links
read_tsv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agricolamz/The_Circassian_Isoglosses_Database/master/database.csv") %>% 
  mutate(id = as.integer(factor(title)),
    title = paste0("<a href =  'https://agricolamz.github.io/The_Circassian_Isoglosses_Database/",
                        id,
                        ".html'>",
                        title,
                        "</a>")) ->
  db

db %>% 
  mutate(value = paste(value, "<br>", source)) %>%
  group_by(id) %>% 
  mutate(impact = n()) %>%
  group_by(id, idiom) %>% 
  mutate(value = str_c(value, collapse = "<br>")) %>% 
  select(impact, title, topic, contributor, idiom, value) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  spread(idiom, value) %>% 
  mutate_all(function(x){ifelse(is.na(x), "", x)}) %>% 
  datatable(escape = FALSE, rownames = FALSE,
            extensions = c('ColReorder', 'Buttons'),
            filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE),
            options = list(pageLength = 20, dom = 'Btip', autoWidth = TRUE, colReorder = TRUE, buttons = I('colvis')))
```

#### Whole dataset
```{r}
DT::datatable(db[,-6],escape = FALSE, rownames = FALSE,
              extensions = c('ColReorder', 'Buttons'),
              filter = list(position = 'top', clear = TRUE),
              options = list(pageLength = 20, dom = 'Btip', autoWidth = TRUE, colReorder = TRUE, buttons = I('colvis'))) # remove description column
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
# isoglosses creation

sapply(seq_along(db$id), function(i){
  indexes <- which(db$id %in% db$id[i])
  title <- paste0("## ", db$id[i], ". ", db$title[i])
  description <- c("### Description", "", 
                   ifelse(is.na(db$description[i]), "", db$description[i]),
                   "")
  
  db$comment[!is.na(db$comment)] <- paste0("(", db$comment[!is.na(db$comment)], ")")
  db$comment[is.na(db$comment)] <- ""
    db$village[!is.na(db$village)] <- paste0("(", db$village[!is.na(db$village)], ")")
  db$village[is.na(db$village)] <- ""
  
  
  values <- c("### Values",
              "There are the following value for each idiom:",
              "",
              paste("*", 
                    db$idiom[indexes],
                    db$village[indexes],
                    db$value[indexes], 
                    db$source[indexes],
                    db$comment[indexes]), 
              "")
  text <- c(title, description, values)
  writeLines(text, paste0(db$id[i], ".Rmd"))
  }
)
```
